metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10747 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: set-value is vulnerable to Prototype Pollution in versions lower than 3.0.1. The function mixin-deep could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype using any of the constructor, prototype and _proto_ payloads.

criterions.comment: node-set-value package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.0-2').
